CustomField.label: PacketViewer Instance URL Override
CustomField.description: Provides an override property to set the appropriate base/instance url in the case the primary method isn't sufficient. This should be set to the "domain name" of this page (e.g. https://<host-name>.cloudforce.com ). Setting this is usually only necessary if the sub-domain is "cloudforce.com" and the Packet Viewer is having issues re-running packets.
